settings.title: Our Commitment to the Environment
settings.subtitle: At Zero Restriction, we reduce our environmental impact with sustainable practices. Our products prioritize performance and durability, aiming to minimize waste.

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.subtitle: The nights are drawing in and the clocks have gone back, as the summer golf season has drawn to a close. Keen golfers will already be thinking ahead to next spring and the thought of long, sunny days on the fairways again.

settings.text: Discover our exclusive line of high-performance running apparel, meticulously designed for trail enthusiasts. These garments are crafted to elevate your running experience, pushing the boundaries of comfort and style while creating new pathways in the running community.
settings.title: We can achieve sustainable transformation. Together.
settings.label: Learn More

settings.title: Championing people
settings.content: Find out how we are using our platform to promote a more inclusive and equitable future.

settings.title: Respecting our planet
settings.content: Discover how we’re working to reduce the impact of our operations and championing circularity to respect our planet’s boundaries.

settings.title: Our pillars. For planet and people.
settings.subtitle: Our foundation drives our constant pursuit of improvement. To ensure every decision is guided by our commitment to environmental and social responsibility. Only then can we pursue our pillars of innovation and circularity, while creating safe and inclusive working conditions for all.

settings.username: It's essential to guarantee that all employees receive fair wages while also maintaining safe and healthy working environments. This not only promotes well-being but also fosters a positive workplace culture.

By incorporating eco-friendly materials into our products and actively working to minimize our carbon footprints, we can contribute to a more sustainable future and protect our planet for generations to come.
It's important to offer transparent and detailed information regarding sourcing and production methods. This helps consumers make informed choices and builds trust in the brand.

It's essential to guarantee that all employees receive fair wages while also maintaining safe and healthy working environments. This not only promotes well-being but also fosters a positive workplace culture.

It's essential to guarantee that all employees receive fair wages while also maintaining safe and healthy working environments. This not only promotes well-being but also fosters a positive workplace culture.

settings.title: Collaborating for a Sustainable Future
settings.subtitle: We partner with suppliers who share our commitment to sustainability. While specific certifications are not detailed on our About Us page, our selection criteria prioritize:

settings.title: Innovative Fabrics for Performance and Sustainability
settings.subtitle: Our garments incorporate advanced materials that offer both performance and sustainability:

settings.textarea: Known for their waterproof and windproof properties, GORE-TEX® fabrics ensure that our jackets perform under various weather conditions.
We are exploring the use of recycled fabrics to reduce waste and promote a circular economy.
Designed for longevity, our products are built to withstand the rigors of the game, reducing the need for frequent replacements.

settings.featured_text: "We look at performance apparel as equipment. Zero Restriction is the 15th club in your bag-engineered to keep you comfortable and performing at your peak, no matter the conditions."

settings.rte: Guaranteeing fabrics are free from harmful substances, enhancing both safety and sustainability.
Ensuring ethical manufacturing practices and supporting workers' rights.
Promoting fair labor practices across the supply chain.
Using recycled materials to reduce our environmental impact.
Ensuring chemicals used in the production process are safe for both the environment and workers.
Focusing on social, ethical, and environmental responsibility.

settings.title: Our Certifications
settings.subtitle: We are committed to sustainability in all our operations, aiming to positively impact the environment and communities we serve. Through innovative practices and responsible resource management, we strive to lead in sustainable development.

settings.title: Built for champions,Built by champions
settings.subtitle: Professional-level performance meets everyday comfort. From signature golf jackets to breathable layers for the gym and office-designed to perform wherever you go.
